markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Waterproof Journal](/Equipment.aspx?ID=845)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [PFS Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=50) pg. 30</row>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) Players can gain access to faction-specific gear by taking the corresponding Faction Gear Access Game Reward, available when they reach 20 reputation with the respective faction._

**Price** 5 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** 1
</row>

**Access** Member of the Pathfinder Society.

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This leather-bound tome is specially treated to protect from water damage and comes with a key and a treated slipcase that bears a [simple lock](/Equipment.aspx?ID=30) to keep the tome secure. This journal is commonly used by adventuring scholars and ship navigators for recording their journeys.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Waterproof Journal
